Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored France to win based on their current form.
Didier Deschamps received some criticism for his reserved tactics.
Deschamps will lead Les Bleus into another campaign, with this season's Nations League next up on the agenda.
Italy had arrived in Germany unbeaten in six games since Spalletti succeeded Roberto Mancini.
Spalletti has since spoken of bringing clarity and consistency to the Italian setup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: France cannot afford such a sub-par showing again in 2024-25, as the nation that finishes bottom of each group will automatically be relegated, while third-placed teams must take part in a playoff to avoid dropping down into League B.
Friday's game will be Italy's first competitive meeting with France in some 16 years, so an age-old rivalry will finally be renewed at Parc des Princes.
